assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was conducted retrospectively from data obtained for clinical purposes. Ethical approval was obtained for the study by the Ethics Committee, College of Medicine and Health Sciences, Sultan Qaboos University, and the Scientific Research Committee, Royal Hospital.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
